Articles.Content:
So, i updated my ksp 1.7.3 to 1.8

I tried to start it with my mods,didnt work, it go stuck in the loading time to the start menu.

Without mods, it got stuck in the main menu, the 1.8 update window showed, but it go frozen so i cant click anywhere.

If i click while its frozen, the game crash.

Any ideas?

Which log you want?

KSP.log? Outpost log?
Yes. Return version 1.7.3 and do not suffer. In a month, I think 1.8 will become playable.

Just now, BezKartuza said:

Yes. Return version 1.7.3 and do not suffer. In a month, I think 1.8 will become playable.

So i cant play 1.8

I need to return 1.7.3

But how do i return? (im on steam)

Ah nvm i just found how to

4 minutes ago, Commodoregamer118 said:

So i cant play 1.8

I need to return 1.7.3

But how do i return? (im on steam)

In Steam, right-click on the game.
Select "properties" from the menu.
In the properties, select "beta versions".
There you can select the old version of the game.

@Commodoregamer118  It's usually a good idea to make a copy of the game somewhere other than the steam folder & use that one to play on, then you don't have to worry about unexpected updates breaking anything.  This is especially good if you play a modded game, but even stock it can be useful if when new versions create new bugs.

Alright the update to 1.8.1 give the same result, so i made a copy in the game, again didnt work,

Then i remembered when my 1.7.3 game was slowly loading and i fixed that in the launcher clicking the option Run in AMD Compatibility Mode.

(due i have AMD Prossecer i enabled the option) and in 1.8.1 it wasnt enabled, then i enabled it and the game loaded much faster and it didnt frozen!!!!!!

Anyone that has problems with KSP and has AMD i want to say you to try this setting!!!
